languages.text: {n}Ульфар усмехается.{/n} "Таково мое прозвище. Не ведает мой голос устали ни в битве, ни на пиру. Часами могу я читать славные саги и устрашать врагов боевым кличем. Это славное имя дали мне мои верные друзья, Арнульф Смеющаяся Секира и Скьядди, Думающий Дважды".

{n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар усмехается.{/n} "Таково мое прозвище. Не ведает мой голос устали ни в битве, ни на пиру. Часами могу я читать славные саги и устрашать врагов боевым кличем. Это славное имя дали мне мои верные друзья, Арнульф Смеющаяся Секира и Скьядди, Думающий Дважды".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Laughing Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se ríe.{/n} «Así me apodan, sí. Mi voz es incansable, ya sea en combate o en un banquete. Puedo recitar las sagas y aterrar a mis oponentes con gritos de guerra durante horas. Es un nombre que me fue otorgado por mis fieles amigos, Arnoolf Hacha Sangrienta y Skyaddi el Pensador Concienzudo».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se ríe.{/n} «Así me apodan, sí. Mi voz es incansable, ya sea en combate o en un banquete. Puedo recitar las sagas y aterrar a mis oponentes con gritos de guerra durante horas. Es un nombre que me fue otorgado por mis fieles amigos, Arnoolf Hacha Risueña y Skyaddi el Pensador Concienzudo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法笑了。{/n}“这是我的绰号，没错。无论是战斗还是盛宴，我的声音都不会疲倦。我可以背诵光荣的史诗，让我的战斗呐喊响彻敌人耳边，长达几个小时之久。这个好名字是我忠实的朋友‘血斧’阿努尔夫和‘三思者’海加迪起的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法笑了。{/n}“这是我的绰号，没错。无论是战斗还是盛宴，我的声音都不会疲倦。我可以背诵光荣的史诗，让我的战斗呐喊响彻敌人耳边，长达几个小时之久。这个好名字是我忠实的朋友‘笑斧’阿努尔夫和‘三思者’海加迪起的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーはクスクスと笑う。{/n}「俺のあだ名だよ。俺の声は戦いの時でも宴の時でも疲れ知らずだ。何時間でも輝かしいサーガを暗唱し、雄叫びで敵を怖がらせることができる。この素晴らしい名は、俺の忠実な友である、アーノルフ・ブラッディ・アックスとスキアディ・トゥワイス・シンカーがつけてくれたんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはクスクスと笑う。{/n}「俺のあだ名だよ。俺の声は戦いの時でも宴の時でも疲れ知らずだ。何時間でも輝かしいサーガを暗唱し、雄叫びで敵を怖がらせることができる。この素晴らしい名は、俺の忠実な友である、アーノルフ・ブラッディ・アックスとスキアディ・トゥワイス・シンカーがつけてくれたんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se met à glousser.{/n} « Oui, c'est ainsi qu'on me surnomme. Que ce soit au combat ou dans une salle de banquet, ma voix est infatigable. Je peux réciter de glorieuses sagas ou terrifier mes adversaires de mon cri de guerre des heures durant. Ce noble sobriquet m'a été donné par mes fidèles camarades Arnoolf Hache-Sanglante et Skyaddi l'Avisé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se met à glousser.{/n} « Oui, c'est ainsi qu'on me surnomme. Que ce soit au combat ou dans une salle de banquet, ma voix est infatigable. Je peux réciter de glorieuses sagas ou terrifier mes adversaires de mon cri de guerre des heures durant. Ce noble sobriquet m'a été donné par mes fidèles camarades Arnoolf Hache-Riante et Skyaddi l'Avisé. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar lacht.{/n} "So nennt man mich, ja. Meine Stimme kennt keine Müdigkeit, weder im Kampf noch beim Gelage. Ich kann stundenlang glorreiche Sagen rezitieren oder meine Feinde mit meinem Kampfschrei ängstigen. Diesen prächtigen Namen haben mir meine treuen Freunde Arnoolf Blutige Axt und Skyaddi Zweifachdenker gegeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar lacht.{/n} "So nennt man mich, ja. Meine Stimme kennt keine Müdigkeit, weder im Kampf noch beim Gelage. Ich kann stundenlang glorreiche Sagen rezitieren oder meine Feinde mit meinem Kampfschrei ängstigen. Diesen prächtigen Namen haben mir meine treuen Freunde Arnoolf Lachende Axt und Skyaddi Zweifachdenker gegeben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar gülüyor.{/n} "Evet, lakabım budur. Çenem dövüşürken de beslenirken de asla durmaz. Şanlı destanları anlatıp düşmanları savaş naramla saatlerce dehşete düşürebilirim. Bu harika lakabı bana sadık dostlarım Arnoolf Kanlı Balta ve Skyaddi Çift Düşünür verdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar chuckles.{/n} "That is my moniker, yes. My voice knows no fatigue whether fighting or feasting. I can recite the glorious sagas and terrify foes with my battle cry for hours. This fine name was given to me by my loyal friends Arnoolf Bloody Axe and Skyaddi Twice-Thinker."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar gülüyor.{/n} "Evet, lakabım budur. Çenem dövüşürken de beslenirken de asla durmaz. Şanlı destanları anlatıp düşmanları savaş naramla saatlerce dehşete düşürebilirim. Bu harika lakap bana sadık dostlarım Arnoolf Kanlı Balta ve Skyaddi Çift Düşünür tarafından verildi."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
